name: Ylem
description:
Ylem is a Twin-Stick Shooter game where the player plays as a group of villager trying to survive against a new menace coming from another planet.

This little fellows has only one weapon: THEMSELVES!

Ylem is a substance that comes from the planet and flows into all creatures.
Its a strong material and a nutrient for the Mechanical Creatures.
Fot this reason they wants to conquer, infect and drain all the substance of the planet.
Plays as the primordial inhabitants and guardians of the planet and defeat the threat before it's too late!

Shoot the villagers against the enemies to destroy them but pay attention: the villagers are also your life.
The more you shoot, the less life you will have. Eliminate all the Boss and save your planet.  

Features:
Easy to play, Hard to master: Try and retry to fight the bosses until you find the best strategies.
Fight or Flee: Learn to use all your abilities and then strike down all the enemies avoiding their deadly attacks at the same time.
